name: Molly (Sunlit-Dreamer, Akakuroneko)
description:
Warning

Story subject covers child abuse with written details. Recommended for 13+.

Sequel to my very first Nano. You won't find it here.

Summary

Molly has always tried to be a good girl. Yet no matter what she does, she has never been able to win the affection of her older siblings.

But she'll keep trying.

She has to.

Characters

Our Main Character



Molly

Trying to find the balance between pleasing her parents and her siblings.
The Siblings



Sarah

The oldest. Has never accepted Molly as part of the family.



Thomas

Sarah's shadow. Follows her orders, never the instigator.There are 2 endings.

Our Team

Sunlit-Dreamer: Writer, Programmer, GUI Artist
Akakuroneko: Sprite/CG Artist
banannasquid: BG Artist
